name: Scuba Diver the Simulation
summary: Scuba Diver - The Simulation is a reality-based, environmentally-respectful video game that enables players to experience the beauty, mystery, and serenity of scuba diving and artifact discovery in exotic real-world locations. Features: Realistic underwater world Game is supported by famouse brands like PADI, Scuba, SubGear, Oceanic, Cressi, Sealife and many more
